name: Attack Aura
description: Passive field around you damaging those around you

baseProperties.effect: Anything other than you within your Aura takes 10 + Tier + Focus + Power

upgrades.name: Selective
upgrades.description: You can select which targets take damage and which don't.

name: Support Aura
description: Passive field around you affecting allies

baseProperties.effect: Allied characters other than you, within your aura, add your Tier to their Accuracy, Damage, Avoidance, Durability or Resistances (chosen when purchasing).

upgrades.name: Affects Self
upgrades.description: You gain the benefits of your Aura.

baseProperties.activation: Action to Summon, free action to maintain
baseProperties.target: Wall must be placed adjacent to you
baseProperties.size: Your wall is 2 x Tier Sp long, and Tier Sp high.
baseProperties.shape: Your wall is a straight line.

upgrades.name: Increased Size
upgrades.description: Increase amount of spaces by Tier x 5

upgrades.name: Shapeable
upgrades.description: You freely manipulate the size and shape.

upgrades.name: Permeable
upgrades.description: You/allies can move through once per turn.

upgrades.name: Heavily Armored
upgrades.description: Increase the DR of your wall by Tier

upgrades.name: Moveable
upgrades.description: You can move the wall 2 x Tier Sp, as a free action

name: Summon
description: Summon a companion or group of companions to fight alongside you.

baseProperties.activation: It takes 2 hours to Summon your Companion
baseProperties.restrictions: The Companion(s) does not have Boons, or Utility Points, but otherwise, they are a full character. When you take 2 50 HP, 4 25 HP or 10 10 HP Companions, they must have the same stats within the set.

upgrades.name: Re-Summon
upgrades.description: It takes a Free Action to summon your Companion, you may do this twice per rest

upgrades.name: Special
upgrades.description: Companion(s), gain a boon, which you may spend on them, but all Companions must take the same boon

upgrades.name: Horde
upgrades.description: Add an additional set of Companion(s)

baseProperties.effect: Action to activate, ends if you are incapacitated. You are invisible and can take the Hide action while in line of sight of enemies.

baseProperties.activation: None, this is a passive ability, you cannot choose not to regenerate
baseProperties.effect: Regain 20 HP at the start of each turn.
baseProperties.unconscious: Wake up once healed to full HP
baseProperties.restriction: You cannot boost your Avoidance or Durability outside of Fighting Actions or external sources.

upgrades.name: Increase Regeneration
upgrades.description: Increase the amount you regenerate by 20 HP.

upgrades.name: Restorative
upgrades.description: Double number of uses and also removes all Conditions

upgrades.name: Ranged
upgrades.description: Can target up to 15 spaces away from you

upgrades.name: Area
upgrades.description: 2 Sp Radius, or increase after 1st purchase, heals targets that you choose
